# url

**Instance Property**

A URL that contains the fully specified location of the targeted file.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var url: URL? { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenPanel] subclass sets this property to `nil` when the selection contains multiple items.
title: url
